docs.title: about
docs.content:
# About

Name: Meftah Zineb  
Title: Future AI Engineer | Deep Learning | Machine Learning | Full-Stack Developer

## Profile
- Computer science student focused on AI applied to robotics and backend development.
- Builds intelligent systems combining LLMs, deep learning, and web automation.
- Projects include OpenAI-based systems, interactive simulators, and end-to-end solutions.

## Interests
- AI for robotics
- Backend development
- Web automation

# Education

- Period: September 2024 - Present
- Certificate: assets/images/L3_Informatique_Avignon_Certificat.pdf

## Baccalauréat Scientifique — Lycée Abd-El-Kader El-Yajouri, Guemar (Algeria)

- Period: 2019 / 2022
- Certificate: assets/images/BAC_Certificat_Officiel.pdf

docs.title: faq
docs.content:
# FAQ

## Who are you?
Meftah Zineb, computer science student and future AI engineer focused on robotics-oriented AI and backend development.

## What do you build?
LLM-powered systems, deep learning projects, interactive simulators, and end-to-end web/AI solutions.

## What are your strongest areas?
- Python + AI tooling (PyTorch, OpenAI API, Hugging Face)
- Backend development (NestJS/Node, REST APIs)
- Web + interactive demos (JS/Canvas, TF.js)

## Where can I see your work?
- Projects are listed in the Projects section with GitHub, Hugging Face, and demo links.
- Publication on Hugging Face blog: https://huggingface.co/blog/zino36/tags-generation-dataset-article

## What languages do you speak?
- French: B2 (certificate: assets/images/TCF.pdf)
- English: strong level (certificate: assets/images/E-Plus.pdf)
- Arabic: C1 (native-level usage)

docs.title: projects
docs.content:
# Projects

## AI Website Generator
- Description: System that generates functional websites from natural-language instructions using LLMs.
- Stack: Python, OpenAI API, web automation
- Demo: https://www.instagram.com/reel/DOjTIVMDUJT/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA%3D%3D

## LeRobot PushT Trainer
- Description: Web app to train and evaluate PushT policies, manage checkpoints, and publish to Hugging Face.
- Stack: Python, LeRobot, Gradio, CUDA
- Model repo: https://huggingface.co/zino36/lerobot-pusht-colab
- Demo Space: https://huggingface.co/spaces/zino36/lerobot-pusht-trainer

## Robot Vision Simulator
- Description: Browser simulator with a robot on a grid (navigation + pick/place) and natural-language commands.
- Vision: COCO-SSD
- Pathfinding: A*
- Stack: JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, TensorFlow.js
- GitHub: https://github.com/ZinebMEFTAH/robot-vision-sim
- Live demo: https://zinebmeftah.github.io/robot-vision-sim

## AI Product Personalization
- Description: Users transform ideas into personalized products using AI models, with a transition to production.
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/anything.personalized

## News Wave
- Description: AI personalized news aggregator with real-time updates from major sources, filtered by user interests.
- GitHub: https://github.com/zineb-hub/NewsWave

## Agricultural Plan Optimization
- Description: AI project optimizing agricultural production in Algeria using graph search and constraint satisfaction.
- GitHub: https://github.com/zineb-hub/Agricultural-Plan-Optimization

## G-Jobs
- Description: Smart platform connecting job seekers with recruiters (filters, messaging, application tracking).
- GitHub: https://github.com/zineb-hub/G-JOB

## Advanced Search Engine
- Description: Java search engine using TF-IDF and BM25 for indexing, analysis, and ranking.
- GitHub: https://github.com/zineb-hub/Search-Engine

## Restaurant Chain
- Description: Multi-country restaurant management system (bookings, stock, staff).
- GitHub: https://github.com/zineb-hub/Restaurant-Chain

## My Online Supermarket (CLI)
- Description: CLI app for supermarket management: suppliers, stock, sales, reports, statistics.
- GitHub: https://github.com/zineb-hub/SuperMarket

## Road Network Analysis (MAP)
- Description: Graph-based road network analysis in Avignon: shortest paths, connectivity, network performance.
- GitHub: https://github.com/zineb-hub/Map

docs.title: skills
docs.content:
# Skills

## Programming
- Languages: Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, Bash
- Paradigms: OOP, functional programming, business logic

## Web Development
- Frontend: Next.js, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3
- Backend: NestJS, Node.js, PHP, Python, REST APIs
- Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL
- Tools: Git, GitHub Actions, Webpack

## AI & Data Science
- Models & techniques: LLMs, fine-tuning, reinforcement learning, computer vision, NLP
- Tools: PyTorch, OpenAI API, Hugging Face, TensorFlow.js
- Data analysis: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib

## Soft Skills
- Teamwork, clear communication
- Leadership (GDSC, AYLP)
- Problem solving
- Continuous learning and tech watch
